trends: There have been no other sightings in Montague
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in class and I looked out the window. Above the treeline I saw multiple bright lights orbiting each other in a cluster that moved out of view through the window. Then I saw them through another window that was to the left of the first window following its original trajectory. then the objects dispersed and dissapeared.
Summary: Cluster of orbiting bright lights in the sky moving from east to weat
